list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed a bug where the current request was not used in all classes Fixed a bug in the Basic Authentication Provider

task.summary: Default task
Added support for adding custom Data Providers
Fixed a bug in the generation of nested resources Bootstrap now reads the TypoScript

Changed the Authentication Provider interface to save the request as a property Added the configuration based Authentication Provider which allows or denys access based on rules defined in TypoScript Moved routine to take the path from the URI to a subclass of \Bullet\Request Changed App test to match the changes Added test for ConfigurationBasedAuthenticationProvider
Added README
Breaking changes - Changed the POST and PUT request handling to replace an existing model instead of updating some properties
Added response logging
Fixed a bug with the rewriting Added the ability to enable request and/or response logging

Removed debugging output from the update routine
Breaking changes - Changed default access to deny read and write for security reasons
Updated the README to reflect the changed default access
Added logging for exceptions Output first level of a lazy object storage's models
Added detection of a requested format Fixed a bug with nested resources introduced in the last commit Fixed a bug in the DataProvider Utility where the wrong path was generated from class names
Fixed a bug in the DataProvider Utility where the wrong path was generated for vendor prefixed Domain Models
Added TypoScript configuration provider to read the configuration from TypoScript Added the ability to define path aliases Added the configuration plugin.tx_rest.settings.addRootObjectForCollection
Added support to fetch objects by properties annotated as @identity Finding objects by identity for writing is not supported
Added support to update models using the identifier
Moved the access control to Access Controller classes Added a customized object manager
Cleaned up the access control mechanism
Added API key field to TYPO3's built in frontend user Added support to check for a valid FE user in the Basic Authentication Provider
WIP: Added React based server (http://reactphp.org/) (Usage: php server.php {port} {IP})
Updated README
Added Content-type header
Fixed a bug where the current request was not used in all classes Fixed a bug in the Basic Authentication Provider

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed a bug where the current request was not used in all classes Fixed a bug in the Basic Authentication Provider

MESSAGE.value: Added support for adding custom Data Providers
Fixed a bug in the generation of nested resources Bootstrap now reads the TypoScript

Changed the Authentication Provider interface to save the request as a property Added the configuration based Authentication Provider which allows or denys access based on rules defined in TypoScript Moved routine to take the path from the URI to a subclass of \Bullet\Request Changed App test to match the changes Added test for ConfigurationBasedAuthenticationProvider
Added README

Added logging Defined all request methods as write requests except of GET and HEAD
Breaking changes - Renamed Request->getPath() to Request->path()
Breaking changes - Changed the POST and PUT request handling to replace an existing model instead of updating some properties
Added response logging
Fixed a bug with the rewriting Added the ability to enable request and/or response logging

Removed debugging output from the update routine
Breaking changes - Changed default access to deny read and write for security reasons
Updated the README to reflect the changed default access
Added logging for exceptions Output first level of a lazy object storage's models
Added detection of a requested format Fixed a bug with nested resources introduced in the last commit Fixed a bug in the DataProvider Utility where the wrong path was generated from class names
Fixed a bug in the DataProvider Utility where the wrong path was generated for vendor prefixed Domain Models
Added TypoScript configuration provider to read the configuration from TypoScript Added the ability to define path aliases Added the configuration plugin.tx_rest.settings.addRootObjectForCollection
Added support to fetch objects by properties annotated as @identity Finding objects by identity for writing is not supported
Added support to update models using the identifier
Moved the access control to Access Controller classes Added a customized object manager
Cleaned up the access control mechanism
Added API key field to TYPO3's built in frontend user Added support to check for a valid FE user in the Basic Authentication Provider
WIP: Added React based server (http://reactphp.org/) (Usage: php server.php {port} {IP})
Updated README
Added Content-type header
Fixed a bug where the current request was not used in all classes Fixed a bug in the Basic Authentication Provider
